query.statement: update [Order] set DeliveryDate = '2006/01/01' where CustomerID = @customerID; select @@ROWCOUNT;
select [Order].* from [Order] where [Order].CustomerID = @customerID order by OrderNo asc;
select * from Company where CustomerType = @customerType order by Name asc;

set ANSI_NULLS OFF; select * from TableWithAllDataTypes where [Boolean] = @boolean and [Byte] = @byte and [Date] = @date and [DateTime] = @dateTime and [Decimal] = @decimal and [Double] = @double and [Enum] = @enum and [Guid] = @guid and [Int16] = @int16 and [Int32] = @int32 and [Int64] = @int64 and [Single] > @singleLowerBound and [Single] < @singleUpperBound and [String] = @string and [NaBoolean] = @naBoolean and [NaDate] = @naDate and [NaDateTime] = @naDateTime and [NaDouble] = @naDouble and [NaInt32] = @naInt32 and [StringWithNullValue] = @stringWithNullValue and [NaBooleanWithNullValue] = @naBooleanWithNullValue and [NaDateWithNullValue] = @naDateWithNullValue and [NaDateTimeWithNullValue] = @naDateTimeWithNullValue and [NaDoubleWithNullValue] = @naDoubleWithNullValue and [NaInt32WithNullValue] = @naInt32WithNullValue;
